title: Client Disconnects Frequently
body:
I know there are a million of these threads and everybody just says "Disable IP Helper and it'll be fine"

My issue is very similar, but different. 

I think it might've started around the new summoners rift update but basically here's what happens

- Will get discreetly disconnected after a little while
(If I'm in queue for longer than 3 minutes I'm pretty much guaranteed to get disconnected without any alert, and no "Accept" prompt comes up I just sit in queue forever until I try loading the shop repeatedly until it reconnects. This made playing Team Builder with my friends impossible last year.)

- 9 times out of 10, my end of game stats wont load and I'll be forced to skip without waiting for stats
(Basically don't get to report, honor, after game chat, or see my grade etc.)

It's somewhat of a minor inconvenience but has been screwing with me for much longer than I can handle at this point.

I also have another friend with the same problem, and have actually had this problem still, even when on another computer. Pls Help

replies.body: It seems to me that your network is having problems maintaining a strong connection, and failing to keep up with you.  Your best bet would be to go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve whatever is causing this.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure settings such as your firewall.  Hopefully, this will help!
